alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 2:08PM EST until December 24 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Dangerous wind chills, snow, and blowing and drifting snow expected. Additional snowfall expected to range between a half inch and 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Indiana, Lagrange and Steuben Counties. In Michigan, Branch and Hillsdale Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Widespread blowing and drifting snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact holiday travel. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause power outages. The dangerously cold wind chills to 20 to 35 below zero will cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...It will remain cold and windy with areas of blowing snow into Saturday and Saturday night. Wind chills are expected to be between 10 and 25 degrees below zero Saturday into Saturday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
